content.rendered:
Important Information

  • Applications for the 2024-2025 Academic Year will open on March 1st
  • We are currently accepting housing applications for Spring 2024.  To apply students should log into MyLaVerne Portal. Click on “Housing” under Student Resources section. Click on
    Student Services and Financial Aid” to find the link “Apply for Housing”.
  • Students who live on campus with a meal plan are eligible for the La Verne Community Engagement Grant, receiving up to $4,000 per year to support on-campus costs (not including summer).
  • All reservations/assignments are tentative until the student registers for classes and makes financial arrangements with the Office of Student Accounts.
  • If you have questions about which application process is right for you (full- or mid-year), email us at housing@laverne.edu, or call 1-909-448-4792.

How to Apply:

  • 2024-25 New Students
  • 2024-25 Continuing Students

Fee Schedule (Rates):

  • 2024-25 License Fee Schedule (Rates)
  • Summer 2024 License Fee Schedule (Rates) and How to Apply

License Agreement (Contract):

  • 2024-2025 Student Housing Terms and Conditions
  • 2023-2024 Student Housing Terms and Conditions

Residence Hall Information:

  • Residence Halls
